name: Die Kugel – Match the Colors
description:
Are you able to estimate colors?

Are you able to distinguish colors?

Try our brand-new game "Die Kugel" and show everyone that you're not color-blind. Your brain can relax while playing, however your eyes will definitely be required.

This game is easy to understand. Just match the color of the Kugel with the color of the area at the bottom. And touch the screen anywhere in the right moment.

It's really simple and anybody can do it.

Now, let's download this game and have some fun, train your reflexes and relax your brain.
